trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When sorting is enabled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls are rendered in the header of each column that has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property set.
trans-unit.target: Quando a classificação está ativada, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>controles são processados no cabeçalho de cada coluna que tenha o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A>conjunto de propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: (For automatically generated columns, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> property contains the same value as the data field.) These links allow you to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by the selected column.
trans-unit.target: (Para colunas geradas automaticamente, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A>propriedade contém o mesmo valor que o campo de dados.)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.SortExpression%2A> Esses links permitem que você classifique o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle pela coluna selecionada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>é gerado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>controle é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataGridSortCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de DataGridSortCommandEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs>é criado por uma chamada para o construtor, as seguintes propriedades são inicializadas com os valores especificados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>|The value of the `dce.CommandArgument` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| O valor de `commandSource` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A>| O valor de `dce.CommandArgument` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridSortCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridCommandEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to get the command source that raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade CommandSource para obter a fonte de comando que gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand>

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised only when a link is clicked in the header of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, the returned source is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object that represents the header.
trans-unit.target: Porque esse evento é gerado somente quando você clica no cabeçalho de um link de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle, a fonte retornada é um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objeto que representa o cabeçalho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to programmatically control the header.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para controlar programaticamente o cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: A origem do comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the expression used to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a expressão usada para classificar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the SortExpression property to determine which column the user selected to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade SortExpression para determinar qual coluna o usuário selecionado para classificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The expression used to sort the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A expressão usada para classificar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.
